name: denitrified
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
denitrify
to break up nitrates (= chemicals containing nitrogen and oxygen), for example in soil, and so release nitrogen into the air: Denitrifying bacteria reduce the fertility of the soil. Opposite
nitrify specialized
